metadata.title: CVE-2021-47456 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: can:peak_pci: peak_pci_remove(): fix UAF When remove the module peek_pci,referencing 'chan' again after releasing 'dev' will cause UAF. Fix this byreleasing 'dev' later. The following log reveals it: [ 35.961814 ] BUG:KASAN: use-after-free in peak_pci_remove+0x16f/0x270 [peak_pci] [ 35.963414] Read of size 8 at addr ffff888136998ee8 by task modprobe/5537 [ 35.965513] Call Trace: [ 35.965718 ] dump_stack_lvl+0xa8/0xd1 [ 35.966028 ]print_address_description+0x87/0x3b0 [ 35.966420 ] kasan_report+0x172/0x1c0[ 35.966725 ] ? peak_pci_remove+0x16f/0x270 [peak_pci] [ 35.967137 ] ?trace_irq_enable_rcuidle+0x10/0x170 [ 35.967529 ] ?peak_pci_remove+0x16f/0x270 [peak_pci] [ 35.967945 ]__asan_report_load8_noabort+0x14/0x20 [ 35.968346 ]peak_pci_remove+0x16f/0x270 [peak_pci] [ 35.968752 ]pci_device_remove+0xa9/0x250

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47456` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-gke - 6.8.0-1003.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1005-intel - 6.8.0-1001.6
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
